title: The Story of Ping
itunes:title: The Story of Ping
description:
What is the ping tool, what is it used for, and where did it come from? We learn about the man who first created ping, why it's not an acronym for anything, and why gamers care about it.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:keywords: ping, network, IP, internet protocol, lag, latency, ISP, internet service provider, network speed, video games, online, multiplayer, internet, web
